attributes.action: No to cuts in Liverpool Children's Centres
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned object to the proposals in relation to Liverpool Children’s Centres.


We CANNOT accept a 53% cut to our Children’s Centre Services – that is £6.6 MILLION


WE KNOW it will affect our services and the support that we receive from centres. We are the second most deprived city in the country but we are taking the biggest cut.

 We insist that you listen to our views and STOP these cuts now.
